title: Cashing Out
description: Married. No matter how many times Nadia’s predicament crosses through her mind, it always ends with the same question: What in the world have I done? After fleeing the scene the morning after wedding, Nadia discovers her husband jumped ship too. It’s only after cryptic postcards from Africa start piling up that she realizes how far her new husband jumped. Judging by the foreign agent hunting for stolen diamonds and the woman claiming the man she married as her own husband, Nadia fears her newly acquired husband jumped too far and too deep.  While trying to untangle the mystery of her temporary husband's disappearance, Caleb issues another wager to help her and her friend out of yet another predicament. Nadia agrees. But helping her friend isn’t her only motivation . . . losing to Caleb is.
author: Nicolette Pierce
